amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $7 million appropriated for renovation of the Botanical Garden to the Office of the Superintendent of Documents for the Federal depository library progam.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in House Rept. 104-146, to transfer the $7 million appropriated in the bill for renovation of the Botanical Garden to the Office of the Superindentent of Documents for the federal depository library progam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Orton amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 321 (Roll no. 412).
